T02D2575:39b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti sarba p'a
T02D2575:39b-2: pam bi shi dha na bi dhi manda la n'a
T02D2575:39b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2575:39b-5: pa'i sdig pa sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
T02D2575:39b-6: zhes bya ba // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2575:39b-7: srid pa'i dra ba rnam bcom nas //
T02D2575:39b-8: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed de //
T02D2575:39b-9: sems can ngan song rnam sbyong ba'i //
T02D2575:40a-2: ma rig 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D2575:40a-3: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i //
T02D2575:40a-4: phan pa'i cho ga bzang po zhig //
T02D2575:40a-5: gzhan gyi don du bri bar bya //
T02D2575:40a-6: de la sems can rnams ni gti mug gi mun
T02D2575:40a-7: khung du ye shes kyi snang ba ma shar ba'i
T02D2575:40a-8: dbang gis nyid sha nying gis za zhing nyid srog
T02D2575:40a-9: nying gis gcod pa las de'i rnam par smin pa
T02D2575:40a-10: tshe 'pho ba lta bu yang nas yang du 'byung
T02D2575:40a-11: ste / nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu ngan song rnams
T02D2575:40a-12: su smin pa rnams la re zhig phan pa'i sems
T02D2575:40a-13: kyis ma rig pa'i rgya dral te /
T02D2575:40a-14: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa las bkrol nas yang dag pa'i thar pa dang /
T02D2575:40a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam bstan te //
T02D2575:40a-16: tshe 'phos pa lta bu de yang de'i gzugs sam dus sma ming ngam /
T02D2575:40a-17: stod g-yogs la sogs pa sta gon byas la /
T02D2575:40a-18: dang po kho nar zhe sdang gi gnyen po mi bskyod pa'i bsnyen pa byas la /
T02D2575:40a-19: rang nyid mi bskyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
T02D2575:40a-20: gyi bskor ba'i snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje dang
T02D2575:40a-21: phreng sangs kyi 'od zer gyis byin rlabs dang /
T02D2575:40a-22: rang mi bskyod pa rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs
T02D2575:40a-23: kyi mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs las sangs rgyas kun
T02D2575:40a-24: gyi sprul pa'i sku bye ba dpag tu med pa
T02D2575:40a-25: sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su skye na /
T02D2575:40a-26: sems can dmyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis kyang
T02D2575:40a-27: skad cig gis chos thams cad mngon par rtogs nas
T02D2575:40a-28: / sems can dmyal ba de dag gi las kyi
T02D2575:40a-29: khams zad par byas nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi
T02D2575:40a-30: rgya mtsho de las bton te /
T02D2575:40a-31: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bag
T02D2575:40a-32: chags dang bcas pa gtan spangs nas sems can de'i
T02D2575:40a-33: yid kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi thugs rig pa
T02D2575:40a-34: lam mtshon pa'i aa dkar po thung du lta bur
T02D2575:40a-35: byas te / sems can de'i gzugs kyi phung po la yid gnas par byas nas /
T02D2575:40a-36: de dag gi sngar gyi gzugs de'i sems dang mthun
T02D2575:40a-37: par bcug la de la bdag nyid gtso bo dang
T02D2575:40a-38: lha rnams skyi thugs ka'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis
T02D2575:40a-39: de'i bag chags dag par bya'o //
T02D2575:40a-40: de'i rjes la bum pa'i chus kyang dri ma bkru ba'i phyir ye shes sems dpa'i phreng sngags dang /
T02D2575:40a-44: sarba karmma a'a pa ra na bi sho dha ni bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2575:40a-46: de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste /
T02D2575:40b-0: @40b sems can dmyal ba las grol bar byas te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2575:40b-1: de dang rjes su mthun pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha nye bar byas la /
T02D2575:40b-2: ser sna'i gnyen po rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
T02D2575:40b-3: yi dgas kyi gnas nang las bsgral te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2575:40b-4: de nas yang de dang rjes su mthun pa'i rigs
T02D2575:40b-5: kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo skal pa dang
T02D2575:40b-6: ldan pa de byol song gi gnas nas thar bar
T02D2575:40b-7: bya ba'i phyir gti mug gi gnyen por rnam par
T02D2575:40b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan brjod nas rnam
T02D2575:40b-10: snang gi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur bar
T02D2575:40b-11: bya'o // de nas yang de dang rjes su mthun
T02D2575:40b-12: par phrag dog gi gnyen por don thams cad grub
T02D2575:40b-14: lha ma yin gyi gnas nas thar par byas la rigs kyi bu de la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2575:40b-15: de'i rjes la 'dod chags kyi gnyen po snang ba mtha' yas kyis sbyang ste /
T02D2575:40b-16: lha rnams kyi gnas las thar par byas nas tshe
T02D2575:40b-17: 'das pa rigs kyi bu de padma'i rigs kyi dkyil
T02D2575:40b-18: 'khor chen por bcug nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2575:40b-19: de'i rjes la dug gsum cha mnyam pa'i gnyen pos sbyang ste /
T02D2575:40b-20: tshe las 'das pa mi'i gnas su byang chub sems
T02D2575:40b-21: dpa' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur
T02D2575:40b-22: te nyon mongs pa de las thar bar bya'o //
T02D2575:40b-23: de ltar nyon mongs pa lnga dang bral nas khams
T02D2575:40b-24: gsum gyi 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas nas thar
T02D2575:40b-25: pa de rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2575:40b-26: bcug ste / dbang rnams yang dag par bskur nas
T02D2575:40b-27: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la rigs nges pa
T02D2575:40b-28: bcug ste / can du bya'o // de ltar na
T02D2575:40b-29: 'di gzhan gyi don du gsungs pa'i cho ga yin
T02D2575:40b-30: bcug ste / can du bya'o // no // sems can ngan song rnam sbyong ba //
T02D2575:40b-31: cho ga myur du byas pa las //
T02D2575:40b-32: bsags pa'i dge bas 'gro ba kun //
T02D2575:40b-33: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal nas //
T02D2575:40b-34: srid pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral te //
T02D2575:40b-35: dpal ldan sangs rgyas thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam
T02D2575:40b-36: dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i tshe 'phos
T02D2575:40b-37: pa la phan pa'i bdun tshigs kyi cho ga /
T02D2575:40b-38: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2575:40b-40: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
